Hi,

I'm using Junit as a test harness for some non-Java tests. To be 
precise, Junit drives a file comparison operation and if the output 
file is different from the benchmark file, an error is produced. 

All of this works fine, but I would like to over-ride the output that 
appears in the TYPE column of the report. Specifically I would like 
to hide the traceback and add my own custom text. Ideally, this 
custom text would include a hyperlink.

Any thoughts? The output I get now follows...

ISQL output does not match the benchmark log file. See difference 
file: output/domain/alter/alter_domain_01.diff expected:<0> but 
was:<1> 

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: ISQL output does not match the 
benchmark log file. See difference file: 
output/domain/alter/alter_domain_01.diff expected:<0> but was:<1>
at com.sas.isql.isqlBase.ISQLTestBase.processISQLInput(Unknown Source)
at com.sas.isql.TestDomainAlter.testAlter_domain_01(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
